Welcome to my Vlog Site

Hiking, Camping, Kayaking and every other excursions.

Snowy Sana Mountain Range

Sana Mountains, Kilpisjarvi

Sana is the second highest mountain of Finland located in Northern district of kilpisjarvi, Lapland. The mountaun is over 1000 meter high from sea level. The height might not be much compared to those in Himalayas, but due to its positioning in North pole, the mountain peak contains snow all around the year. The whole mountain range is the part of 800 kilometer long hiking trail famouslu knows as Nordkalott trail run through Norway, Sweden and Finland. Finland contains 79 kilometer of the trail. The trail is wilderness hit facilities in suitable distances where hikers can stay night after long hike.

Depiction of Finnish Medivle Elites Dinning Culture

Turku Castle Museum

The well preserved Turku Castle Museum gives you some hint of how Finnish medivle culture look like. Turku was once capital of Finalnd and Turku castle was the seat of the power. Nowsays, served as the musuem Turku castle dazzles visitor with weel preserved past.

A rainbow in the sky of Sanajarvi

Sanajarvi, Kilpisjarvi

Being the part of Nordkallot trail, Sanajarvi is a pinnacle of wild mountanous beauty. The glacial lake is formed by meting ice which you can drink strait from the stream. The ranbow was the lucky momemnt what I captured after a light rain.
